name: 末世围城
description:
The game is continuously being developed and optimized, and we will continue to collect suggestions from players! Whether you are imagining new features and gameplay, or complaining about numerical balance, you can fill in the form. We will continue to optimize the relevant content and strive to bring you a better gaming experience.
Feedback link: https://docs.qq.com/form/page/DQVZ3U3hRUkZBZ0dR
Discord communication group: https://discord.gg/52rHvKRekM

The game is still under development, and we will bring new content to enrich the gameplay. At the same time, we will continue to improve the game content based on player feedback to make it perfect. We will continue to develop the game for one year (until March 2025). During this period, we will carry out a number of major updates, gradually optimize the game performance, enhance the gameplay, enrich the game content, and expand the multiplayer online mode, among other improvements. Thank you for your support!

-----

Immerse yourself in this epic survival game teeming with strategy and thrills! Confront relentless attacks, fighting tooth and nail to survive in a world overrun by chaos. Select from a diverse pool of 100 heroes, each boasting unique skills, allowing you to craft endless strategic combinations. As zombies swarm the map, survival demands frenzied action and quick thinking. Simple yet endlessly engaging, this game guarantees a rush of excitement with its straightforward gameplay and infinite replay possibilities. Dare to challenge yourself, showcase your strategic prowess, and emerge as the hero destined to conquer this perilous world! Unleash your tactical brilliance and triumph in the face of relentless adversity!


In a dystopian past, a mutated virus ravaged humanity, leaving survivors in perpetual fear. Some developed supernatural abilities, offering a glimmer of hope. A secret organization observed these individuals, conducting experiments to create formidable warriors. Trained in a brutal arena, fighters faced zombies to prove their combat prowess. Sacrifices of fallen warriors enhanced their peers, ensuring only those who continually grew stronger could escape the deadly arena. This merciless competition tested not only strength but also willpower. In a world dominated by despair, only those with unyielding faith and tenacity could triumph. Escaping this chaos granted freedom, a new life, and legendary status.
